name: Femi
greetingText: It's me Oke (I), the love of your life ðŸ˜Š
wishText: You have brought so much joy to my life and you've made me know what true love really is. I know the distance between us isn't easy, and there are days when I really miss being by your side. But you make it easy to love you even from a distance, and I'm so lucky and grateful to have you in my life. so today I celebrate you, I celebrate the love you've given to me and i pray you never forget how much  I love you!
